meanings.definition: Suitable for or communicated to the general public.
meanings.sent1: The exoteric information was easy for everyone to understand.
meanings.sent2: The exoteric nature of the event made it accessible to all.
meanings.sent3: The exoteric explanation of the complex topic brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her exoteric teaching style was like a beacon of light in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The exoteric signs outside the museum made it impossible to miss.

meanings.definition: Not limited to or intended for a select group.
meanings.sent1: The exoteric message was meant for all to hear.
meanings.sent2: The exoteric approach welcomed everyone to participate.
meanings.sent3: The exoteric party invitation surprised the exclusive club members.
meanings.sent4: His exoteric taste in music resonated with a wide audience.
meanings.sent5: The exoteric rules of the game made it inclusive for everyone.
